page.title: 04Recreation
page.content: There are several different clubs in the area.There is a karate club and cubs in the school,there is also a gymnastics club.In West Hyde there is a Judo and ski club,and at the community centre there are discos and parties that children can go to and a bar night, for adults and children. There is also bingo and parties for adults.There is a roller disco for children with disco skates.This is held at Mill End sports and social club. In my spare time I go to the roller disco on Mondays.Tuesday I go swimming.Wednesdays I go to the games night at the club.Thursdays I play football.Fridays I go to the community centre and saturdays and sundays I go to the community centre in the evenings.
